article_title: Alberta NDP call for resignation of Alberta Health Minister Tyler Shandro over bullying allegations
article_description: Alberta Opposition Leader Rachel Notley is calling for the resignation of Health Minister Tyler Shandro following revelations by CBC News that Shandro berated a Calgary doctor at his home and belittled citizens in emails
article_content: Alberta Opposition Leader Rachel Notley is calling for the resignation of Health Minister Tyler Shandro following revelations by CBC News that Shandro berated a Calgary doctor at his home and belittled citizens in emails This is a profound lapse in judgmen   6175 chars
